FuncDef:
The aps group command adds an interface to an LMSP group.
The undo aps group command removes an interface from an LMSP group.
By default, an interface is not added to any LMSP group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an LMSP group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 192.

ExtraInfo:
An interface can only be added to one LMSP group. Before running the aps group command to add an interface to an LMSP group, ensure that the interface is not a member of another LMSP group.
When the working interface is removed from the LMSP group using the undo aps group command, the protection interface is also removed. When the protection interface is removed from the LMSP group, the working interface is not affected.
